resources.string: "The present moment is the only time over which we have dominion."
"Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without."
"Mindfulness is the aware, balanced acceptance of the present experience."
"In the midst of movement and chaos, keep stillness inside of you."
"The mind is everything. What you think you become."
"Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions."
"Every morning we are born again. What we do today matters most."
"The only way to live is to accept each minute as an unrepeatable miracle."
"Mindfulness isn\'t difficult. We just need to remember to do it."
"Life is available only in the present moment."
"Calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence."
"Peace is not the absence of chaos, but the presence of inner harmony."
"Your calm mind is the ultimate weapon against your challenges."
"In the midst of winter, I found there was within me an invincible summer."
"The quieter you become, the more you can hear."
"Serenity is not freedom from the storm, but peace within the storm."
"Inner peace begins the moment you choose not to allow another person or event to control your emotions."
"Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without."
"The mind is like water. When it\'s turbulent, it\'s difficult to see. When it\'s calm, everything becomes clear."
"Find peace in the midst of chaos."
"The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step."
"Growth is the only evidence of life."
"You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream."
"The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be."
"Change is the end result of all true learning."
"Every experience, no matter how bad it seems, holds within it a blessing of some kind."
"The wound is the place where the Light enters you."
"What you seek is seeking you."
"Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself."
"The soul always knows what to do to heal itself."
"Gratitude turns what we have into enough."
"When we focus on our gratitude, the tide of disappointment goes out and the tide of love rushes in."
"Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul."
"The more grateful I am, the more beauty I see."
"Gratitude is riches. Complaint is poverty."
"Joy is the simplest form of gratitude."
"Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow."
"In daily life we must see that it is not happiness that makes us grateful, but gratefulness that makes us happy."
"Gratitude is the healthiest of all human emotions."
"When you are grateful, fear disappears and abundance appears."
"Love is the bridge between you and everything."
"Compassion is not a relationship between the healer and the wounded. It\'s a relationship between equals."
"The heart has reasons that reason does not understand."
"Love is the greatest refreshment in life."
"Where there is love there is life."
"Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend."
"The more you love, the more you can love and the more intensely you can experience love."
"Love is the flower you\'ve got to let grow."
"Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud."
"The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved."
"Courage doesn\'t always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, \'I will try again tomorrow.\'"
"You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face."
"The only way to do great work is to love what you do."
"Strength does not come from the physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will."
"Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear."
"You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think."
"The strongest hearts have the most scars."
"What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us."
"The human spirit is stronger than anything that can happen to it."
"You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength."
"Patience is not the ability to wait, but the ability to keep a good attitude while waiting."
"Good things come to those who wait, but better things come to those who work for it."
"The two most powerful warriors are patience and time."
"Everything has its time and everything dies."
"Time is the most valuable coin in your life. You and you alone will determine how that coin will be spent."
"Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet."
"The key to everything is patience. You get the chicken by hatching the egg, not by smashing it."
"Time and patience are the strongest warriors."
"Patience is the companion of wisdom."
"All good things come to those who wait."
"Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication."
"The simplest things are often the truest."
"Less is more."
"Simplicity is the glory of expression."
"The greatest ideas are the simplest."
"Simplicity is the key to brilliance."
"The more complex the mind, the greater the need for simplicity."
"Simplicity is the final achievement."
"The simplest solution is usually the best one."
"Simplicity is the essence of happiness."
"Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better."
"In nature, nothing is perfect and everything is perfect."
"Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished."
"The earth has music for those who listen."
"Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience."
"Nature is not a place to visit. It is home."
"The clearest way into the Universe is through a forest wilderness."
"Study nature, love nature, stay close to nature. It will never fail you."
"Nature is the art of God."
"The poetry of the earth is never dead."
"The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing."
"Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens."
"Wisdom comes from experience, and experience comes from mistakes."
"The more you know, the more you realize you don\'t know."
"Wisdom is not a product of schooling but of the lifelong attempt to acquire it."
"The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool."
"Wisdom is the reward you get for a lifetime of listening when you\'d have preferred to talk."
"The beginning of wisdom is the fear of the Lord."
"Wisdom is the right use of knowledge."
"The older the fiddle, the sweeter the tune."
"Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony."
"The purpose of our lives is to be happy."
"Life is what happens when you\'re busy making other plans."
"Get busy living or get busy dying."
"You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough."
"Many of life\'s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up."
"If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things."
"Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game."
"Money and success don\'t change people; they merely amplify what is already there."
"The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing."
"Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts."
"The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams."
"It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light."
"Whoever is happy will make others happy too."
"Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail."
"You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated."
"The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall."
"In the end, it\'s not the years in your life that count. It\'s the life in your years."
"Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated."
"Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier."
"Meditation is not about stopping thoughts, but recognizing that we are more than our thoughts and our feelings."
"The mind is like a muscle - the more you exercise it, the stronger it gets."
"Meditation is the journey from sound to silence, from movement to stillness, from a limited identity to unlimited space."
"When you own your breath, nobody can steal your peace."
"Meditation is the art of doing nothing and letting everything happen."
"The mind is everything. What you think you become."
"Meditation is not a way of making your mind quiet. It is a way of entering into the quiet that is already there."
"Your mind is a garden. Your thoughts are the seeds. You can grow flowers or you can grow weeds."
"Meditation is the key to understanding yourself and the world around you."
"The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it."
"Be the change you wish to see in the world."
"Everything you\'ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear."
"The only impossible journey is the one you never begin."
"What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals."
"Believe you can and you\'re halfway there."
"It always seems impossible until it\'s done."
"The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today."
"Don\'t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going."
"The best way to predict the future is to create it."
"Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm."
"Mindfulness means being awake. It means knowing what you are doing."
"The practice of mindfulness begins in the small, remote cave of your unconscious mind and blossoms with the sunlight of your conscious life."
"Mindfulness is the miracle by which we master and restore ourselves."
"Mindfulness is the key to unlock the fullness of life."
"When you practice mindfulness, you become more aware of the present moment."
"Mindfulness is the art of conscious living."
"The practice of mindfulness is the practice of being fully alive."
"Mindfulness is the path to freedom."
"Through mindfulness, we can learn to live in the present moment."
"Mindfulness is the foundation of a happy life."
"Every day is a new beginning. Take a deep breath and start again."
"You are enough. You have enough. You do enough."
"The sun is a daily reminder that we too can rise again from the darkness."
"Your life is your message to the world. Make sure it\'s inspiring."
"The beauty of life is that it\'s unpredictable. Embrace the journey."
"You are never given a wish without also being given the power to make it come true."
"Life is not about waiting for the storm to pass but learning to dance in the rain."
"The greatest adventure is what lies ahead."
"Today is your day! Your mountain is waiting, so get on your way!"
"You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you."
"The only way to do great work is to love what you do."
"Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success."
"The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step."
"What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals."
"The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams."
"It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light."
"Whoever is happy will make others happy too."
"Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail."
"You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated."
"The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall."
"In the end, it\'s not the years in your life that count. It\'s the life in your years."
"Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated."
"Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier."
"When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on."
"Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else."
"Don\'t judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant."
"The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart."
"It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities."
"Many people will walk in and out of your life, but only true friends will leave footprints in your heart."
"To the world you may be one person, but to one person you may be the world."
"The only impossible journey is the one you never begin."
"What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals."
"Believe you can and you\'re halfway there."
"It always seems impossible until it\'s done."
"The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today."
"Don\'t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going."
"The best way to predict the future is to create it."
"Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm."
"The mind is everything. What you think you become."
"Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without."
"Every experience, no matter how bad it seems, holds within it a blessing of some kind."
"The wound is the place where the Light enters you."
"What you seek is seeking you."
"Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself."
"The soul always knows what to do to heal itself."
"Gratitude turns what we have into enough."
"When we focus on our gratitude, the tide of disappointment goes out and the tide of love rushes in."
"Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul."
"The more grateful I am, the more beauty I see."
"Gratitude is riches. Complaint is poverty."
